A '''tuff slab''' is a [[tuff]] variant of a [[slab]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Tuff slabs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{Breaking row
|Tuff Slab
|Pickaxe
|Wood
|horizontal=1}}

=== Note blocks ===
Tuff slabs can be placed under [[note block]]s to produce "bass drum" sounds.

== Sounds ==
